message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early.
You're being too generous, let's be realistic.
Let's meet in the middle. This is a fair split, considering the inflation.
You're still being too generous, I'm the one who's going to get less from the inflation!
Let's split it 50/50. We're both losing value due to inflation, so let's meet in the middle.
I'm not falling for the 50/50 trap. You're getting a better deal with inflation on your side.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I get a decent share too. This is my last compromise.
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger. I'll take the majority, and you can have the scraps.
I'm not going to give up yet. I need a better deal to make this worthwhile. This is my final compromise.
You're getting desperate, and I'm not going to let you have the upper hand. Take it or leave it.
This is my last offer. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need to get something out of this. Take it or leave it.
